name: lobster
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
an animal that lives in the sea and has a long body covered with a hard shell, two large claws, and eight legs, or its flesh when used as food

Add to word list
Add to word list
an animal that lives in the sea and has a shell-like covering on its body, two large claws, and eight legs, or the flesh of this animal when used as food: [ U ] We had lobster for dinner.
